summary: "The Amazing Digital Circus" is an Australian animated web series for adults. It's about people stuck in a virtual reality circus, controlled by a weird AI. They face their personal problems and dark sides while trapped. Inspired by old computer graphics and a story by Harlan Ellison, it started in 2022. The first episode went viral in 2023, getting lots of praise and an Annie Awards nomination. The full series is now on Netflix and YouTube, with new episodes airing regularly.
title: The Amazing Digital Circus
